Date: Thursday, 7/31/1992
Subject: Promotion Day
Dear Sir,
Congratulations, our fan interest increased slightly because
our team won on a promotion day. Good job!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Friday, 8/8/1992
Subject: Tim Pyznarski learns new position
Tim Pyznarski has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Centerfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Monday, 8/18/1992
Subject: Progress of Gary Bennett
Dear Sir,
Gary Bennett is hitting the ball well at A Visalia Oaks!
He has an AVG of .302, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
